system.description:
A Paladin must assist anyone who requests help, with two exceptions: they are not required to aid evil characters or evil causes, and if they are already on a mission for a higher authority (such as a quest or service to a ruler), they may offer only limited assistance—such as providing shelter, advice, or guidance—along with an explanation for their refusal.

This assistance never involves donating money or items and is only given for a short time through direct service.
